participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and active, Emma loves to stay fit and enjoys spending quality time with her family.
participant_1.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, Liam is learning to embrace change after his recent breakup.
participant_2.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.
